toolbox.desc: Toolbox with implemented interface in extrafunctions/toolboxes

name.desc: Name corresponding to the name of the interface without the "Class" suffix

toolbox.name: niwf

freesurfersetup.desc: Path to FreeSurfer setup script, executing before any FreeSurfer environmental setup

freesurferenvironment.desc: Path to FreeSurfer environmental setup script, executing before any FreeSurfer command

freesurferoutputformat.desc: Output type used by FreeSurfer (GZs are not supported by SPM)
